name: suksma - my malice tears space time fabric putting black holes to shame

warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // feather pen
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1-3*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_8=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1+3*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // darken over time
warp_11=`    ret -= 0.02;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    // add noise
warp_14=`    //float2 uv_noise = uv*texsize_noise_lq.zw*texsize.xy + rand_frame.xy;
warp_15=`    //ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv_noise)*2-1)*0.02;
warp_16=`}

comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    //uv.y = rad*rad;
comp_4=`    float srad = sqrt(rad)+ 0.05;
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_7=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv + (cos(ret.xz*17.3))*0.02).xyz;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`

comp_11=`    //ret *= float3(1.3,0.8,0.5);

comp_13=`}
